> <OLD>
>
> Tucson follows Rodimus and to be sure he could be heard, he roars to his Maximal
> comrades, in a tone of voice that clearly signals them that he was still very much alive.
> He then looks down to Rodimus and gets beside him.
>
> " For once, I agree with you. We may not always see eye to eye but it doesn't mean I
> don't respect who you are. Now, our only hope to escape this threat is to relocate all
> together. We must return to the Ark and see if we can get it flying just enough to relocate
> its position. Before I became a warrior, I did extensive work in mechanical and weaponry
> restoration. I haven't lost sight of those skills. I can attempt to restore the essential
> components for transport, and worry about the rest at a later time. Of course I will need a
> bit of help from anyone with engineering as their background, which I believe Stanton and
> Bump, along with Legacy, could be a big help. All right, let's guide them home!"
>
> He quickens his pace with a beat of his large wings.

<NEW>

RODIMUS nodded slightly as his large wings cupped the air for a moment
and then also flapped, propelling his large fiery form through the
air.

"I wish we could move the Ark." RODIMUS said after a moment, "But any
changes that large could create severe problems in the timeline." He
said firmly. "But perhaps we can work on defenses."

> <OLD>
>
> nighlight slowly moved and started to woke up, she felt so weak. She vagely
> heard familiar noises.

RODIMUS looked down to see his wife NIGHTLIGHT cradled gently in his
claws. He paused slightly as he shifted her to a position where she
would be as comfortable as possible for the flight home.

"Come!" RODIMUS said in a deep voice as he and TUSCON flew over the
other MAXIMALS. "It is time to go home!" His voice may not have been
as loud as TUSCON's but it did carry enough to get the point across.

There was something different about RODIMUS, the difference being more
than just his new mode. He seemed to now have a beast mode. It was not
that something was wrong, but that he had grown more than just in
size, but somehting else seemed to be happening as well.

Wisdom perhaps? Self confidence? Also, what other changes have
occurred in the bot who once once a stubborn but charismatic Cavalier,
then commander who lacked confidence?

Time would tell . . .

(TAG)

- Preston
